Inner Vision.quote: "Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God." (Matthew 5:8)

Third Eye.quote: "When your eye is single, your whole body will be full of light." (Luke 11:34)

Divine Perception.quote: "The eye of the soul, which is blinded by other things, is made clear by contemplation." (Plato, Republic)

Spiritual Vision.quote: "The Self is to be seen, heard, reflected upon, and meditated upon." (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 2.4.5)

Mystic Sight.quote: "The eye with which I see God is the same eye with which God sees me." (Meister Eckhart)

Illuminated Vision.quote: "Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth." (Quran 24:35)

Divine Witness.quote: "I am the Witness, the Pure Consciousness." (Ashtavakra Gita 1:12)

Sacred Seeing.quote: "Open my eyes, that I may behold wondrous things." (Psalm 119:18)

Transcendent Vision.quote: "The eye of wisdom beholds the truth of emptiness." (Heart Sutra)

Divine Insight.quote: "Knowledge is the eye of all." (Chandogya Upanishad 7.7.2)

Celestial Vision.quote: "In thy light shall we see light." (Psalm 36:9)

All-Seeing Eye.quote: "The eyes of the Lord are in every place." (Proverbs 15:3)

Eternal Sight.quote: "That which is never seen but is the Seer." (Kena Upanishad 1.6)

Inner Light.quote: "If therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light." (Matthew 6:22)

Sacred Vision.quote: "Where there is no vision, the people perish." (Proverbs 29:18)

Divine Recognition.quote: "I was blind, but now I see." (John 9:25)

Spiritual Eyes.quote: "The eye is the lamp of the body." (Matthew 6:22)

Divine Discernment.quote: "The spiritual person judges all things." (1 Corinthians 2:15)

Universal Vision.quote: "In all directions, That alone appears." (Ashtavakra Gita 2:2)

Sacred Perception.quote: "The eyes of your understanding being enlightened." (Ephesians 1:18)

Divine Observation.quote: "Nothing in all creation is hidden from God's sight." (Hebrews 4:13)

Spiritual Perception.quote: "What is seen was not made out of things that are visible." (Hebrews 11:3)

Divine Awareness.quote: "I am the eye in all that sees." (Bhagavad Gita 10:20)

Sacred Sight.quote: "They looked to Him and were radiant." (Psalm 34:5)

Divine Understanding.quote: "Now we see in a mirror dimly, but then face to face." (1 Corinthians 13:12)

Eternal Vision.quote: "The pure in heart see God everywhere." (Sri Ramakrishna)

Divine Seeing.quote: "One who sees all beings in the Self and the Self in all beings." (Isha Upanishad 6)
